text: The 10th Politburo and the 10th Secretariat of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks) were elected by the 1st Plenary Session of the 10th Central Committee, in the immediate aftermath of the 10th Congress. ==10th Politburo== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" |+Candidate members ! width=25%|Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration |- ! scope="row" | (1888–1938) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |- ! scope="row" | (1875–1946) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1986) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |} {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" |+Full members ! width=25% |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration |- ! scope="row" | (1883–1936) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |- ! scope="row" | (1883–1936) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |- ! scope="row" | (1870–1924) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |- ! scope="row" | (1878–1953) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |- ! scope="row" | (1879–1940) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | |} ==10th Secretariat== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" ! scope="col" |Name (birth–death) ! scope="col" | Took office ! scope="col" | Left office ! scope="col" | Duration ! scope="col" style="width:30em;" | Note |- ! scope="row" | (1894–1937) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | | — |- ! scope="row" | (1890–1986) | 16 March 1921 | 3 April 1922 | | align="left" | Elected Executive Secretary at the 1st Plenary Session. |- ! scope="row" | (1878–1943) | 16 March 1921 | 8 August 1921 | | align="left" | Relieved of his duties at the 4th Plenary Session. |} ==References== Category:Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union members Category:Secretariat of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union members Politburo Politburo Politburo
title: 10th Politburo and the 10th Secretariat of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks)
